column1: The Commission to Investigate Allegations of Bribery or Corruption (CIABOC) had filed an indictment
against the Appellant in respect of an incident involving soliciting and accepting a sexual gratification.
The four counts contained in the said indictment are as follows:
Count 01 - for an offence punishable under Section 16 (b) of the Bribery Act ;
Count 02 - for an offence punishable under Section 19 (c) of the Bribery Act ;
Count 03 - for an offence punishable under Section 16 (b) read with Section 25(1) of the Bribery Act ;
Count 04 - for an offence punishable under Section 19 (c) read with Section 25(1) of the Bribery Act.
